Key Match Events: Aaron Judge hit a game-tying two-run home run in the eighth inning
Giancarlo Stanton followed with a go-ahead home run off Emmanuel Clase
Lane Thomas hit a two-out double in the ninth inning
Jhonkensy Noel hit a walk-off two-run home run in the 10th inning
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
Aaron Boone reflected on the tough loss and the importance of moving forward
Luke Weaver acknowledged his mistake in the ninth inning and vowed to bounce back
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was a crucial one in the ALCS, with the Yankees facing a 2-1 deficit
The Yankees' closer, Luke Weaver, struggled in the ninth inning, allowing a game-tying double and then a walk-off home run
The Guardians' bullpen, which had been a strength all season, was able to get the win
The Yankees will start rookie Luis Gil in Game 4, while the Guardians will counter with Gavin Williams
